report.title: Cornwall Wildlife Trust download format 1
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id left join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_phylum on ARRAY[cttl_phylum.taxon_meaning_id] && o.taxon_path and cttl_phylum.taxon_rank_sort_order=30 and cttl_phylum.preferred=true and cttl_phylum.taxon_list_id=15 where o.group_id=943

order_bys.order_by: cttl.kingdom_taxon, cttl_phylum.taxon, cttl.order_taxon, cttl.family_taxon, cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon
